backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Gambia Market backend, defining data types (UserProfile, Listing, Message, Transaction, Review, Report) and state maps, with mixins for blob storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a single visual theme redesign feature to its affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of each frontend source file, covering styles, data files, and components for the Gambia Market blueprint app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Gambia Market PWA, including manifest link, iOS/Android PWA meta tags, and the React root div.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for Gambia Market specifying app name, theme colors, display mode, and icon references for 192×192 and 512×512 sizes.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing a cache-first strategy for GET requests, caching the app shell on install and cleaning old caches on activate.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing client-side navigation state across all app pages (home, sell, chat, profile, listing detail, message thread, public profile, edit listing) and rendering the appropriate page component.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Sticky top navigation header with logo, search bar (desktop and mobile), theme toggle, sell button, and profile icon, using ThemeContext for dark/light mode switching.
frontend/src/components/AuthGuard.tsx: Authentication gate component that shows a loading spinner, LoginPrompt, or ProfileSetup based on Internet Identity auth state and user profile existence before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/BoostedListingMo: Visual mockup component comparing a standard listing versus a boosted listing side-by-side, along with boost pricing tiers, used for illustrative/blueprint purposes.
frontend/src/components/BoostModal.tsx: Modal dialog for boosting a listing, displaying selectable boost duration/price options fetched from the backend and triggering the boost mutation on confirmation.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar with Home, Search, Sell, Chat, and Profile tabs, showing an unread conversation badge on the Chat tab.
frontend/src/components/CategoryFilter.t: Horizontally scrollable category filter bar that renders emoji-labeled buttons for each listing category, highlighting the currently selected one.
frontend/src/components/ChatMockup.tsx: Static chat UI mockup displaying a listing context header, sample buyer/seller messages, and a placeholder input bar, used for demo/blueprint display.
frontend/src/components/ConversationItem: Renders a single conversation list item showing the other user's avatar, name, last message, and relative timestamp, with an unread indicator dot.
frontend/src/components/DatabaseStructur: Displays the 'Database Structure' section of a blueprint page by rendering a grid of EntityCard components from the database data source.
A form component for editing a user's name and location, using the useUpdateUser mutation and showing loading/error states via toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/EntityCard.tsx: Renders a database entity as a card with a header, a fields table (name, type, description), and an optional relationships section.
frontend/src/components/FeatureBreakdown: Renders the 'Core Feature Breakdown' section by iterating over features and conditionally rendering specialized mockup/detail sub-components based on each feature's data shape.
frontend/src/components/FeatureCard.tsx: Displays a single feature's icon, category badge, title, and description as a styled card using a dynamic icon map and category color map.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedListings: Renders a horizontally scrollable row of featured/boosted listings with photo or emoji fallback, price, and location, triggering a click callback per listing.
frontend/src/components/FulfillmentOptio: Displays a grid of fulfillment options (delivery vs. meet-up) each with an icon, description, and sample form fields, styled differently per type.
frontend/src/components/FutureFeatureCar: Renders a single future feature card showing its title, description, and a phase badge (Phase 2 or Phase 3) with corresponding color styling.
frontend/src/components/FutureFeaturesSe: Displays the 'Future Features' section split into Phase 2 and Phase 3 groups, each rendered as a grid of FutureFeatureCard components.
Modal dialog that prompts unauthenticated users to enter a display name before sending a message, with an alternative option to sign in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-width hero banner for the Gambia marketplace featuring a background image, headline, browse/sell CTA buttons, and summary stats (listings, sellers, regions).
frontend/src/components/HomeFeedMockup.t: Renders a responsive grid of sample listing cards with category icons, price, condition badge, and location data from a SampleListing array.
Reusable inline-edit component that displays a labeled value and toggles to an input field on edit, saving changes via an async onSave callback.
frontend/src/components/InstallBanner.ts: PWA install prompt banner that handles both the native beforeinstallprompt event (Android/desktop) and iOS share-sheet instructions, with dismissal persisted to localStorage.
frontend/src/components/JourneyFlow.tsx: Renders a vertical step-by-step user journey flow with numbered steps, icons, and color theming (green for buyer, secondary for seller) based on a UserFlow data object.
frontend/src/components/ListingCard.tsx: Clickable card component that displays a marketplace listing's photo or emoji placeholder, price, condition, location, and featured/status badges.
frontend/src/components/ListingCreationC: Renders a grid of listing creation step cards, each displaying a step number, title, icon, and a field mockup (upload, dropdown, number, radio, or location) based on the step's fieldType.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Displays a login prompt UI in either fullpage or inline/card variant, triggering Internet Identity authentication via the useInternetIdentity hook.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders a single chat message bubble with sent/received styling, inline editing, delete support, and a deleted-message placeholder state.
frontend/src/components/MonetizationSect: Renders the monetization strategy section, separating revenue streams into a highlighted primary driver and a grid of secondary streams with optional boost mockup.
frontend/src/components/MVPPlanSection.t: Renders the MVP plan section with a must-have/nice-to-have feature checklist and an 8-week development timeline using MVPTimeline.
frontend/src/components/MVPTimeline.tsx: Displays a responsive grid of MVP timeline week cards, each showing a milestone and its tasks with color-coded styling.
frontend/src/components/MyListingCard.ts: Displays a compact card for a user's own listing with thumbnail, price, status badge, boost indicator, and actions for editing, boosting, and deleting via a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/NavigationTabs.t: Renders a sticky horizontal navigation bar with emoji-labeled tabs for different blueprint sections, highlighting the active tab with a primary color indicator.
frontend/src/components/PatternDivider.t: A simple presentational component that renders a decorative kente-pattern horizontal divider, with an optional thin variant.
frontend/src/components/PaymentMethodsMo: Displays a mockup UI showing selectable payment method cards with icons and availability badges, plus transaction status badge indicators.
frontend/src/components/PhotoCarousel.ts: An image carousel component supporting navigation arrows, dot indicators, a photo counter, and a fullscreen overlay mode for browsing ExternalBlob photos.
frontend/src/components/PhotoUpload.tsx: Handles photo uploads up to a configurable maximum, displaying thumbnail previews with remove buttons and an add-photo trigger that converts files to ExternalBlob instances.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: A modal form for first-time profile setup that collects name, phone, and location, then saves the data via the useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation before calling onComplete.
Displays a four-column stats row (listings, avg rating, reviews, followers) with animated count-up numbers for a user's profile.
frontend/src/components/ProfileTabs.tsx: Renders a tabbed profile view with tabs for listings, reviews, activity, and followed sellers, fetching following data and seller profiles to display in each respective tab.
frontend/src/components/RecentSearchChip: Renders a list of recent search terms as dismissible chips with options to click a search, remove individual entries, or clear all.
frontend/src/components/RegistrationFlow: Displays a multi-step registration flow as a vertical timeline of cards, each showing step fields with their placeholders and validation state icons.
frontend/src/components/ReportModal.tsx: A modal dialog that lets users select a reason and submit a report against a listing, using the useCreateReport mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/RevenueCard.tsx: Displays a single revenue stream card with its type badge, description, and projected impact, highlighting primary streams with a special border and badge.
frontend/src/components/ReviewForm.tsx: A form component for submitting a star rating and optional comment review for a listing, using the useCreateReview mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/ReviewsList.tsx: Fetches and renders a list of reviews for a given user, showing reviewer avatar, name, star rating, comment, and relative timestamp, with loading skeletons and an empty state.
frontend/src/components/RoadmapPhaseCard: Renders a single roadmap phase as a timeline card showing the phase number, timeframe, key deliverables, and success metrics with color-coded styling per phase.
frontend/src/components/RoadmapSection.t: Section component that renders all roadmap phases by mapping over static roadmapPhases data and rendering a RoadmapPhaseCard for each.
frontend/src/components/SearchBar.tsx: A controlled text input with a search icon, Enter-key submit support, and a clear button that appears when the input has a value.
frontend/src/components/SearchFilterMock: Renders a static UI mockup of a search bar with category, price range, and condition filters using provided FilterOptions data.
frontend/src/components/SectionContainer: A reusable layout wrapper that renders a titled section with an optional subtitle and decorative underline, constraining content to a max-width centered container.
frontend/src/components/SellerInfo.tsx: Displays a clickable seller profile card showing avatar, name, verification badge, location, average rating, and follower count fetched via React Query hooks.
frontend/src/components/SkeletonListingC: A shimmer placeholder card that mimics the layout of a listing card while its data is loading.
frontend/src/components/StarRating.tsx: An interactive or read-only star rating component supporting hover effects and three size variants.
frontend/src/components/TechStackCard.ts: Displays a single tech stack item card with a color-coded category badge, technology name, and rationale description.
frontend/src/components/TechStackSection: Renders the full tech stack section by mapping over techStackItems data and displaying each as a TechStackCard in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/TrustSafetyMocku: Renders a grid of trust and safety mechanism cards (rating, review, report, block) with type-specific interactive mockup UI for each mechanism.
frontend/src/components/UserFlowsSection: Displays buyer and seller user journey flows side-by-side on desktop and as a toggled single view on mobile using JourneyFlow components.
frontend/src/components/VerifiedBadgeMoc: Shows a two-panel mockup with a verification process stepper and a sample verified seller profile card including badge image.
frontend/src/components/ZeroResultsState: Displays an empty-state UI when a search returns no results, offering a clear-search button and optional suggested category chips.
frontend/src/contexts/ThemeContext.tsx: Provides a React context for light/dark theme management, persisting the user's preference to localStorage and syncing with the system color scheme preference.
frontend/src/data/database.ts: Defines static data for the app's database schema, describing entities (Users, Listings, Messages, Transactions) with their fields, types, and relationships.
frontend/src/data/features.ts: Contains static data describing core app features (e.g., phone registration, listing creation, nearby feed) including UI flow steps, fields, and sample listings.
frontend/src/data/futureFeatures.ts: Lists planned future features (e.g., AI recommendations, escrow, voice search) organized by development phase (Phase 2 or 3).
frontend/src/data/index.ts: Barrel file that re-exports all data modules (features, userFlows, database, techStack, mvpPlan, futureFeatures, monetization, roadmap) from a single entry point.
frontend/src/data/monetization.ts: Defines revenue stream data including boosted listings, subscriptions, transaction fees, and sponsorships, with pricing tiers and projected impact descriptions.
frontend/src/data/mvpPlan.ts: Specifies the MVP feature list with priorities (must-have vs. nice-to-have) and an 8-week development timeline broken into milestones and tasks.
frontend/src/data/roadmap.ts: Defines a four-phase product roadmap (Foundation through Scale) with deliverables and success metrics for each phase spanning months 1–12.
frontend/src/data/techStack.ts: Defines and exports an array of tech stack items for the Gambia Market app, each describing a technology choice (e.g., React Native, PostgreSQL, Afrimoney) with its category, rationale, and color label.
frontend/src/data/userFlows.ts: Defines and exports buyer and seller user journey flows, each containing ordered steps with labels, descriptions, and icon names for use in UI flow diagrams.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries whenever the Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: Re-exports the useGetCallerUserProfile hook from useQueries.ts as a convenience wrapper.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for the app, covering user profiles, listings, messages, reviews, and mutations that interact with the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUnreadMessageCount: Computes the count of unread messages for the current user by comparing conversation message timestamps against locally stored last-viewed timestamps, and exports a helper to mark conversations as viewed.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind CSS, and defines a comprehensive set of CSS custom properties for the Sunrise Market color palette in both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Chat.tsx: Displays the user's messaging inbox by grouping all conversations by unique user+listing pairs, showing the latest message per conversation. Requires authentication; shows a login prompt if no identity is present.
frontend/src/pages/CreateListing.tsx: Form page for creating a new marketplace listing with fields for title, description, category, price, condition, location, and photos. Includes additional real estate-specific fields (property size, bedrooms, furnished status) when the real estate category is selected.
frontend/src/pages/EditListing.tsx: Form page for editing an existing listing, pre-populating all fields from the fetched listing data and submitting updates via the useUpdateListing hook. Supports the same category and real estate subcategory options as the create flow.
frontend/src/pages/HomeFeed.tsx: Main home page showing a hero section, a featured/boosted listings row, a category filter, and a responsive grid of active listings. Filters listings by selected category and displays skeleton cards while loading.
frontend/src/pages/ListingDetail.tsx: Detail view for a single listing showing a photo carousel, price, description, seller info, reviews, and a message/report action bar. Detects if the viewer is the listing owner to conditionally hide the message button.
frontend/src/pages/MessageThread.tsx: Real-time message thread view between the current user and another user for a specific listing, supporting both authenticated and anonymous (guest name) message sending. Auto-scrolls to the latest message and prompts guests for a name before their first send.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Renders the authenticated user's profile page with editable name/location fields, avatar, stats, listings, and reviews. Handles logout and redirects unauthenticated users to a login prompt.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProfile.tsx: Displays a read-only public profile for a given user Principal, showing their avatar, rating, active listings, and reviews. Includes loading skeleton and a not-found fallback state.
frontend/src/pages/Search.tsx: Provides a search page with a query input, recent searches stored in localStorage, popular category chips, and a results grid using the useSearchListings hook.
frontend/src/types/blueprint.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for the app's blueprint/design spec, covering features, user flows, listing creation steps, chat, payments, trust mechanisms, and database entities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading URL query parameters (supporting both standard and hash-based routing), persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the Gambia Market frontend, defining custom fonts (Sora, Plus Jakarta Sans), a CSS-variable-based color palette, border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations including shimmer, slide-up, and fade-in.
project_state.json: Tracks the current state of the Gambia Market project at schema version 1.0.0, recording one completed feature (full visual theme redesign) and no pending feature requests or known issues.
